item.title: So I Became a Vegetarian
item.description: My wife heard it from the mayor. Two weeks ago, I jumped right into it. I became a vegetarian, but kept it to myself.

item.title: We have a budget
item.description: This is a re-write of a post I authored back in 2017. Our situation has changed enough since I first wrote about budgeting that I didn’t feel like it was useful anymore as-is.
